codeSystems.name: ActivityDefinitionLevelCS
codeSystems.title: Level (ActivityDefinition)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the Level for an ActivityDefinition. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: ActivityDefinitionServiceTypeCS
codeSystems.title: Service Type (ActivityDefinition)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the Service Type for an ActivityDefinition. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: ActivityDefinitionUsageContextWorkflowTypeCS
codeSystems.title: Usage Context for Workflow Type (ActivityDefinition)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the Usage Context for Workflow Type for an ActivityDefinition. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: BillChargeItemCS
codeSystems.title: ChargeItem (Bill Invoice)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the ChargeItem for a lineItem from a Bill. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: BillTypeCS
codeSystems.title: Type (Bill Invoice)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the Type for Bill. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: ClaimItemCategoryCS
codeSystems.title: Category of the item (Claim)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the category for the item under a Claim. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: ClaimRejectionReasonsCS
codeSystems.title: Rejection Reasons (Claim)
codeSystems.description:
Indicates the rejection reason of an item from a Claim. 
Values limited by openIMIS.

codeSystems.name: ClaimStatusCS
codeSystems.title: Status of the claim (Claim|ClaimResponse)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the status of the Claim. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: ClaimSupportingInfoCategoryCS
codeSystems.title: Category of the supporting info (Claim)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the category for the supportiong info under a Claim. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: ClaimVisitTypeCS
codeSystems.title: Visit Type (Claim)
codeSystems.description:
Indicates the visit type of the Claim. 
Values limited by openIMIS.

codeSystems.name: ContractPremiumCategoryCS
codeSystems.title: Premium Category (Contract)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the category of the premium for the Contract. Cannot be extended.

codeSystems.name: ContractPremiumPayerCS
codeSystems.title: Premium Payer (Contract)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the payer of the premium for the Contract. Can be extended in openIMIS. Need to match openIMIS database payer list.

codeSystems.name: ContractPremiumTypeCS
codeSystems.title: Premium Type (Contract)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the type of the premium for the Contract. Cannot be extended.

codeSystems.name: ContractResourcePartyRoleCS
codeSystems.title: Resource Party Role (Contract)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the participant engagement type for the Contract term.

codeSystems.name: ContractScopeCS
codeSystems.title: Scope (Contract)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the scope for the Contract. Values defined by openIMIS. Cannot be extended.

codeSystems.name: CoverageItemBenefitTypeCS
codeSystems.title: Type of benefit (Coverage)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the type of benefit under a Coverage. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: CoverageItemCategoryCS
codeSystems.title: Category of the item (Coverage)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the category for the item under a Coverage. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: DiagnosisICD10Level1CS
codeSystems.title: ICD 10 Level 1 diagnosis (Claim)
codeSystems.description: Example of diagnosis to be used with Claim resource. The actual list is configured in openIMIS.

codeSystems.name: FeedbackPayloadCS
codeSystems.title: Feedback Payload (CommunicationRequest | Communication)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the Feedback Payload code for a CommunicationRequest and Communication. List defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: FeedbackStatusCS
codeSystems.title: Feedback Status (CommunicationRequest)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the Feedback Status for a CommunicationRequest. Partial list defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: GroupConfirmationTypeCS
codeSystems.title: Confirmation Types (Group)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the confirmation type for the Group. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

codeSystems.name: GroupTypeCS
codeSystems.title: Group Type (Group)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the type of the Group. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

codeSystems.name: InsurancePlanCoverageBenefitLimitCS
codeSystems.title: Coverage Benefit Limit Types (InsurancePlan)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the Coverage Benefit Limit Types for an InsurancePlan. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: InsurancePlanGeneralCostTypeCS
codeSystems.title: General Cost Type (InsurancePlan)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the General Cost Type for an InsurancePlan. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: InvoiceChargeItemCS
codeSystems.title: ChargeItem (Invoice)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the ChargeItem for a lineItem from an Invoice. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: InvoiceTypeCS
codeSystems.title: Type (Invoice)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the Type for an Invoice. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: LocationTypeCS
codeSystems.title: Location Type (Location)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the location type. Values defined by openIMIS. Cannot be extended.

codeSystems.name: MedicationItemTypeCS
codeSystems.title: Item Type (Medication)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the Medical Item Type for an Medication. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: MedicationLevelCS
codeSystems.title: Level (Medication)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the Level for a Medication. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

codeSystems.name: OpenIMISIdentifierCS
codeSystems.title: openIMIS Identifiers (All)
codeSystems.description: Identifiers that are specific to openIMIS and could not be found in standard sources.

codeSystems.name: OrganizationHFCareTypeCS
codeSystems.title: Health Facility Care Type (Organization)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the care type of the Health Facility (Organization). Values defined by openIMIS. Cannot be extended.

codeSystems.name: OrganizationHFLegalFormCS
codeSystems.title: Legal Forms (Organization)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the legal forms of the Organization. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

codeSystems.name: OrganizationHFLevelCS
codeSystems.title: Health Facility Level (Organization)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the level of the Health Facility (Organization). Values defined by openIMIS. Cannot be extended.

codeSystems.name: OrganizationPHActivityCS
codeSystems.title: Activity (Organization)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the activity of the PolicyHolder Organization. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

codeSystems.name: OrganizationPHLegalFormCS
codeSystems.title: Legal Forms (Organization)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the legal forms of the PolicyHolder Organization. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

codeSystems.name: PatientContactRelationshipCS
codeSystems.title: Contact Relationship (Patient)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the Relationship of a Patient with the Head of the Family. Values defined by openIMIS.

codeSystems.name: PatientEducationLevelCS
codeSystems.title: Education Level (Patient)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the Education level of a Patient. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

codeSystems.name: PatientProfessionCS
codeSystems.title: Profession (Patient)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the profession of a Patient. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

codeSystems.name: PractitionerQualificationTypeCS
codeSystems.title: Qualification Type (Practitioner)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the Qualification Type of a Practitioner.

codeSystems.name: UsageContextAgeTypeCS
codeSystems.title: Usage Context for Age Type (ActivityDefinition|Medication)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the Usage Context for Age Type for an ActivityDefinition or Medication. Values defined by openIMIS. Cannot be extended.

codeSystems.name: PatientIdentificationTypeCS
codeSystems.title: Identification Type (Patient)
codeSystems.description: Indicates the type of document the Patient used to identify himself. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.
